titleStmt.title: [Psalmes or prayers] [taken out of Holy Scripture].
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, Saint, 1469-1535.

notesStmt.note: T.p. lacking; title suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
First part has running title: The Kynges psalmes.
"The King's Psalms" originally compiled by St. John Fisher--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Second part has special t.p.: The Queenes praiers or meditations wherein the mynde is stirred to suffer all afflictions here. -- Imprinted at London : By H. Wykes.
Place of publication and publisher taken from special t.p.; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print; t.p. lacking.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
